subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Flyers goalie Brian Boucher was given the hook in the second period, making this the sixth of 10 playoff games in which a Flyers starting goalie did not finish the game.
snippet: Flyers goalie Brian Boucher was given the hook in the second period, making this the sixth of 10 playoff games in which a Flyers starting goalie did not finish the game.
